About.AboutLong:
Passionate about technology and skilled at the intersection of math and coding, I have a strong enthusiasm for learning. From challenging classes in high school to pursuing computer science, I embrace every opportunity to grow and excel.

Beyond coding, I find joy in dancing, sports, movies, books, and music. A team player at heart, I value collaboration and embrace diverse perspectives, constantly seeking personal and professional growth.

Excited to contribute my skills and bring fresh perspectives to innovative projects. I am always on the lookout for new opportunities to expand my knowledge and experience, whether through work, campus involvement, or other learning experiences.
About.AboutShort: A rising junior at Mahindra University, studying computer science and engineering

1 - high school.Description: Completed high school with a focus on science and mathematics.

2 - Graduation.Description: Currently pursuing a BTech degree in Computer Science and Engineering at Mahindra University.
